slug.description: The user-friendly and URL-valid name of the data element. [Learn more about the slug concept](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clean_URL#Slug).

name.description: The display name of the object.

oneOf.description: The value of the attribute given in current locale determined by context of the API request.
